examples: We had a brief honeymoon in Paris.
After so many years of marriage, we're planning a second honeymoon.
They go on honeymoon the day after the wedding.
(usually figurative) The honeymoon was over and the reality of what she had taken on began to dawn.
(figurative) There was always a honeymoon period when Mum started a new job.
They can't decide where to go for their honeymoon.
While on honeymoon in Bali, she learned to scuba dive.
